    Quaternion.identity(Quaternion target)

    static Quaternion
    Quaternion.inverse(Quaternion q, Quaternion target)
    Finds the inverse, or reciprocal, of a quaternion, which is the conjugate divided by the magnitude squared.

    a-1 := a* / |a|2

    If a quaternion is of unit length, its inverse is equal to its conjugate.

    Returns the identity if the quaternion cannot be inverted.
    static Quaternion
    Quaternion.inverse(Quaternion q, Quaternion target, Quaternion conjugate)
    Finds the inverse, or reciprocal, of a quaternion, which is the its conjugate divided by its magnitude squared.

    a-1 := a* / |a|2

    If a quaternion is of unit length, its inverse is equal to its conjugate.

    Quaternion.dot(Quaternion a, Quaternion b)
    Finds the dot product of two quaternions by summing the products of their corresponding components.

    a b := areal breal + aimag bimag

    The dot product of a quaternion with itself is equal to its magnitude squared.

  • Uses of Quaternion in camzup.kotlin

    Subclasses of Quaternion in camzup.kotlin
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    KtQuat
    Provides Kotlin operator overloading support for quaternions.
    Methods in camzup.kotlin with parameters of type Quaternion
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    KtQuat
    KtQuat.div(Quaternion b)
    Returns a new quaternion with the division of the instance by the right operand.
    void
    KtQuat.divAssign(Quaternion b)
    Divides the instance by the right operand (mutates the quaternion in place).
    KtQuat
    KtQuat.minus(Quaternion b)
    Returns a new quaternion with the subtraction of the right operand from the instance.
    void
    KtQuat.minusAssign(Quaternion b)
    Subtracts the right operand from the instance (mutates the quaternion in place).
    KtQuat
    KtQuat.plus(Quaternion b)
    Returns a new quaternion with the addition of the right operand to the instance.
    void
    KtQuat.plusAssign(Quaternion b)
    Adds the right operand to the instance (mutates the quaternion in place).
